Race.GeneralTitle: Democratic Parish Executive Committee Member at Large

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Dist. Number Eight Prop. No. 1 -- $75 Service Charge - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire District Number Eight Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Service Charge Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Caddo Parish Fire District Number Eight, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to collect a service charge in an amount not to exceed $75.00 per annum for each residential or commercial structure for a term not to exceed ten years, commencing January 1, 2020 (an estimated $231,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the service charge for an entire year), for fire protection services, to be assessed on persons owning each such structure, whether occupied or unoccupied, located wholly or partly within the boundaries of the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Dist. Number Eight Prop. No. 2 -- 4 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire District Number Eight Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Maintenance Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Caddo Parish Fire District Number Eight, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a four (4) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028 (an estimated $182,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and obtaining water for fire protection purposes, and to the extent permitted by law, acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating emergency medical facilities?
